channel.title: Logo and Banner Creation with Matik! (Closed)
channel.description:
Hey! I've seen that a lot of people in the community are looking for people to make logos, and luckily, I've got myself Photoshop as well as Illustrator after almost an entire year!
Here's some work I've done previously in Photoshop and Illustrator:
![Waves|500x500](upload://geaQRE5AIyfvyHvoQosfai4EMWk.png)![TL|500x500](upload://dar8kGIuVZ5IIZzybBwQzrvQuea.jpg)![Tokyo|500x500](upload://eSEQK4cHfYEKkT0hi4c0RX6hGFw.jpg)
If anyone's interested, drop down a message and tell me what you need! :matik:
So here's what you need to write in order for me to get a basic understanding:
* Text in the logo * Items of importance (optional) * Colors that you want me to use * Any specific fonts (optional) * If you want me to make an additional soundcloud banner to match with your profile picture * If you want the logo to portray a specific meaning. (optional)
[spoiler]Sidenote: I may be a bit busy because of school, so I might not get you a final design straight away![/spoiler]

item.description:
Hey there Matik!
Osharu here, asking on behalf of Exo. He asks if you can make him a SoundCloud banner with the extended fire background you used for his profile photo, but this time, for it to say “Exo Music”. He says that if it’s too much then don’t even try, that he’ll figure something out later, but he thanks you either way.
